data.name: GBuffer
data.value: ..\Resources\GBuffer.hlsl;System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089;Windows-1252

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_1BIT
data.value: 1-bit Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_1BIT_DESC
data.value: Draws an image with 1-bit color information (2 colors).

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_BLOOM
data.value: Bloom Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_BLOOM_DESC
data.value: Provides a bloom (glow) effect to bright areas on an image.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_BURN_DODGE
data.value: Burn/Dodge Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_BURN_DODGE_DESC
data.value: Applies a burn or dodge processing to the image being rendered.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_CHROMATIC_ABBERATION
data.value: Chromatic Aberration

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_CHROMATIC_ABBERATION_DESC
data.value: Provides a simulation of chromatic aberration around the edges of an image.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_DISPLACEMENT
data.value: Displacement Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_DISPLACEMENT_DESC
data.value: Displaces pixels on a background image by weighting the pixels from another image over top.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_FILM
data.value: Old Film Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_FILM_DESC
data.value: Draws images to make it appear as though those images are from an old film reel.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_GAUSS_BLUR
data.value: Gaussian Blur Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_GAUSS_BLUT_DESC
data.value: Blurs a texture using a gaussian blurring technique and sends the blurred data to the effect output.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_GBUFFER
data.value: GBuffer

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_GBUFFER_DESC
data.value: GBuffer for rendering multi target effects.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_GRAYSCALE
data.value: Grayscale Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_GRAYSCALE_DESC
data.value: Renders sprites, primitives, etc... as grayscale.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_INVERT
data.value: Invert Color Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_INVERT_DESC
data.value: Inverts the colors of an image.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_LIGHTING
data.value: 2D Lighting Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_LIGHTING_DESC
data.value: Provides per pixel lighting to a 2D scene.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_POSTERIZE
data.value: Posterize Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_POSTERIZE_DESC
data.value: Performs a reduction in colors for an image.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_SHARPEMBOSS
data.value: Sharpen/Emboss Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_SHARPEMBOSS_DESC
data.value: Sharpens or embosses an image.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_SOBEL
data.value: Sobel Edge Detection Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_SOBEL_DESC
data.value: Renders the edges of an image using a Sobel filter.

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_WAVE
data.value: Wave Effect

data.name: GOR2D_EFFECT_WAVE_DESC
data.value: Causes a waving effect on a texture.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_2D_IMAGE_ONLY
data.value: The {0} image must be 2D.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_ATLAS_INVALID_FORMAT
data.value: The texture format [{0}] is not valid for a texture atlas.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_BEGIN_NOT_CALLED
data.value: The Begin() method must be called prior to calling this method.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_CANNOT_CHANGE_STATE_INSIDE_BEGIN
data.value: Cannot change the render target, depth/stencil or viewport during a Begin/End rendering block.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_CBUFFER_SLOT_INVALID
data.value: The constant buffer slot must be 0 or less than {0}.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_EFFECT_BEGIN_RENDER_CALLED
data.value: The BeginRender method has already been called on the '{0}' effect.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_EFFECT_BEGIN_RENDER_NOT_CALLED
data.value: The BeginRender method has not been called.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_EFFECT_BLUR_KERNEL_SIZE_INVALID
data.value: The kernel size must be between 3 and 81 (inclusive).

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_EFFECT_BLUR_RENDER_TARGET_FORMAT_NOT_SUPPORTED
data.value: The format [{0}] is not supported for render targets.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_EFFECT_DISPLACEMENT_UNSUPPORTED_FORMAT
data.value: The format [{0}] is not supported for render targets.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_EFFECT_PASS_RENDER_CALLED
data.value: The BeginPass method has already been called for pass #{0} on effect '{1}'.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_INVALID_SAMPLER_INDEX
data.value: The sampler index must be 0 or less than {1}.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_NO_RTV
data.value: Could not initialize the 2D renderer because there was no render target assigned to slot 0 on the graphics interface.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_POLY_SPRITE_NOT_ENOUGH_VERTS
data.value: A minimum of 3 vertices is required for a polygonal sprite.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_RENDER_ALREADY_STARTED
data.value: Begin() was called previously. Call End() prior to calling Begin() again.

data.name: GOR2D_ERR_SRV_SLOT_INVALID
data.value: The shader resource slot must be 0 or less than {0}.
